pr_title: Update app to use latest Firestore data model

timeline.message: Auto-generated changes
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/google/ground-android into update-remote-db
`record` -> `observations` in remote db
`featureType` -> `layer` in local and remote dbs
Layer `listHeading` -> `name` in local and remote dbs
Form `elements` list -> map
Sort form fields by index
Field `labels` -> `label` in remote db
Option `labels` -> `label` in remote db
Fix capitalization of accessor method name
Feature `center` -> `location` in remote db
Observation `modified` -> `last_modified` in remote db
Feature `modified` -> `last_modified` in remote db
Audit info `[client|server]TimeMillis` -> `Timestamp` in dbs and model
Update project acls to new remote db structure
Fix typo in manager role key
Multiple choice Options list -> map
Sort Options by index number in remote db
Sort Options by index number in remote db
Tolerate missing AuditInfo in remote db
Tolerate color in Layer root on remote db
Increase dex heap size to fix GC heap size errors on build
Remove unused layerId from remote Observations
Bug fix: Insert observations in local db also when there are no mutations
Show label for options instead of uuid
Fix typo
Move default field index to converter
Layer `itemLabel` -> `name` in local and remote db

timeline.bodyText:
I think these changes are harmless as these formatting settings are not for java or xml files.
Do they appear back if you manually revert these changes?
timeline.author: shobhitagarwal1612
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -79,9 +79,33 @@
         <pair source="c" header="h" fileNamingConvention="NONE" />
       </extensions>
     </Objective-C-extensions>
+    <DBN-PSQL>
+      <case-options enabled="true">
+        <option name="KEYWORD_CASE" value="lower" />
+        <option name="FUNCTION_CASE" value="lower" />
+        <option name="PARAMETER_CASE" value="lower" />
+        <option name="DATATYPE_CASE" value="lower" />
+        <option name="OBJECT_CASE" value="preserve" />
+      </case-options>
+      <formatting-settings enabled="false" />
+    </DBN-PSQL>
     <Python>
       <option name="USE_CONTINUATION_INDENT_FOR_ARGUMENTS" value="true" />
     </Python>
+    <DBN-SQL>
+      <case-options enabled="true">
+        <option name="KEYWORD_CASE" value="lower" />
+        <option name="FUNCTION_CASE" value="lower" />
+        <option name="PARAMETER_CASE" value="lower" />
+        <option name="DATATYPE_CASE" value="lower" />
+        <option name="OBJECT_CASE" value="preserve" />
+      </case-options>
+      <formatting-settings enabled="false">
+        <option name="STATEMENT_SPACING" value="one_line" />
+        <option name="CLAUSE_CHOP_DOWN" value="chop_down_if_statement_long" />
+        <option name="ITERATION_ELEMENTS_WRAPPING" value="chop_down_if_not_single" />
+      </formatting-settings>
+    </DBN-SQL>

replies.bodyText: They do.. I can't seem to remove them :/
replies.author: gino-m

replies.bodyText: Let's ignore it for now and keep the changes
replies.author: shobhitagarwal1612

timeline.bodyText: IIUC, updating heap size is necessary if build is slow. Were there any significant performance improvements after this change? I haven't faced any build performance issues recently
timeline.author: shobhitagarwal1612

replies.bodyText: Build was failing with "OutOfMemoryError: GC overhead limit exceeded". I upped the heap size to get it to pass. Ok to keep it?
replies.author: gino-m

timeline.bodyText: Does this mean code is deprecated now?
timeline.author: shobhitagarwal1612

replies.bodyText: Nope.. code is an optional, language neutral value, used for analysis. So if the survey is in five languages, for example, values can be still be compared.
replies.author: gino-m

timeline.bodyText: If we traceback the call, this observation is fetched from local db in getObservations() and isn't mutated in the path. Maybe we should revert this back too. Unless I am missing some point, can you please check?
timeline.author: shobhitagarwal1612

replies.bodyText: Observations are being fetched from the remote db in ObservationRepository line 97, not the local one; previous they were not being written at all unless there were related mutations; not sure how this was ever working, unless something changed.
replies.author: gino-m

timeline.bodyText:
StyleNestedObject is converted back to Style in the next step. Better to create instance of Style instead of StyleNestefObject in "orElse" block.
    Style style =
        Optional.ofNullable(obj.getDefaultStyle())
            .map(StyleConverter::toStyle)
            .orElse(
                Style.builder().setColor(Optional.ofNullable(obj.getColor()).orElse(FALLBACK_COLOR)).build());

    layer
        .setId(id)
        .setListHeading(getLocalizedMessage(obj.getListHeading()))
        .setItemLabel(getLocalizedMessage(obj.getItemLabel()))
        .setDefaultStyle(style);
timeline.author: shobhitagarwal1612

replies.bodyText: The two are functionally equivalent, and the cost of conversion is approx. 0, so I opted for creating a default input instead of output. Happy to change this, just wanted to mention it since in general we want to avoid over-optimizing code at the cost of readability.
replies.author: gino-m

timeline.message: Refactor conversion of legacy layer color field
Revert accidental change

timeline.author: shobhitagarwal1612

timeline.message: Remove unused import
